description: I. Letter dated 28/07/2009 from Sir Gus O'Donnell KCB to Sir David Normington KCB regarding annual party conferences. 2 p. II. Letter dated 12/01/2009 from Sir Gus O'Donnell KCB to Alesha De-Freitas regarding the attendance of non-departmental public bodies (NDPBs) at annual part conferences. 2 p.
